EmailTemplate.name: Bill-To Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Bill-To Update - Account {!Account.Cust_ID__c} - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NEW PROCESS!!! All Contract Customer Maintenance, Pricing, SPC and ECommerce requests can now be submitted easily right from Salesforce.com! Beginning February 4, no further requests will be accepted via email. Please search "Account Maint" in the Answers tab to learn more information.
<Enter contractmaint@officedepot.com in the additional cc field and remove this section>
Team,
Please make the following changes to the Bill-To for Account {!Account.Cust_ID__c} - {!Account.Name}:
Addr Line 1: Addr Line 2: City: St: Zip:
Note: Also need to attach customer request from a valid E-mail domain or company letterhead to this E-mail.
